COMMAND.NAME: gettopleft
COMMAND.PARAMETER: windowName The name of the e93 window this command will act upon.
COMMAND.SUMMARY: Report line number and number pixels left of the top visible line in a window
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Report the line number that is currently positioned at the top of windowName and the offset in pixels from the left.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
windowName is not provided.
windowName is not an e93 window.
